system:
note description: "Gtk Implementation for EV_REGION" author: "" date: "$Date: 2013-05-30 14:33:11 -0700 (Thu, 30 May 2013) $" revision: "$Revision: 92653 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xmlEV_REGION_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_region_i.xmlEV_REGION_I
FalseDISPOSABLE
create ../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_makemake
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_old_make../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_old_makeold_make (an_interface: ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION) -- Creation method. do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_assign_interfaceassign_interface (an_interface) end
f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_makemake -- Initialize Current. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_gdk_regiongdk_region := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gdk_region_newgdk_region_new ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_set_is_initializedset_is_initialized (True) end
feature -- Element Change
f_set_rectangle../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_set_rectangleset_rectangle (a_rectangle: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xmlEV_RECTANGLE) -- Set region to area a_rectangle. local rectangle_struct: FalsePOINTER do rectangle_struct := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_c_gdk_rectangle_struct_allocatec_gdk_rectangle_struct_allocate {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_set_gdk_rectangle_struct_xset_gdk_rectangle_struct_x (rectangle_struct, a_rectangle.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx) {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_set_gdk_rectangle_struct_yset_gdk_rectangle_struct_y (rectangle_struct, a_rectangle.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy) {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_set_gdk_rectangle_struct_widthset_gdk_rectangle_struct_width (rectangle_struct, a_rectangle.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth) {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_set_gdk_rectangle_struct_heightset_gdk_rectangle_struct_height (rectangle_struct, a_rectangle.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight) ../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_disposedispose ../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_gdk_regiongdk_region := {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gdk_region_rectanglegdk_region_rectangle (rectangle_struct) rectangle_struct.Falsememory_free end
f_offset../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_offsetoffset (a_horizontal_offset, a_vertical_offset: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Move Current a a_horizontal_offset horizontally and a_vertical_offset vertically. do {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gdk_region_offsetgdk_region_offset (../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_gdk_regiongdk_region, a_horizontal_offset, a_vertical_offset) end
feature -- Access
f_intersect../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_intersectintersect (a_region: ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION): ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION -- Intersect a_region with Current. local l_result_imp, l_region_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xmlEV_REGION_IMP do Result := ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface.Falsetwin l_result_imp ?= Result.../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation check l_result_imp /= Void then end l_region_imp ?= a_region.../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation check l_region_imp /= Void then end {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gdk_region_intersectgdk_region_intersect (l_result_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_gdk_regiongdk_region, l_region_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_gdk_regiongdk_region) end
f_union../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_unionunion (a_region: ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION): ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION -- Create a union a_region with Current. local l_result_imp, l_region_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xmlEV_REGION_IMP do Result := ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface.Falsetwin l_result_imp ?= Result.../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation check l_result_imp /= Void then end l_region_imp ?= a_region.../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation check l_region_imp /= Void then end {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gdk_region_uniongdk_region_union (l_result_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_gdk_regiongdk_region, l_region_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_gdk_regiongdk_region) end
f_subtract../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_subtractsubtract (a_region: ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION): ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION -- Subtract a_region from Current. local l_result_imp, l_region_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xmlEV_REGION_IMP do Result := ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface.Falsetwin l_result_imp ?= Result.../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation check l_result_imp /= Void then end l_region_imp ?= a_region.../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation check l_region_imp /= Void then end {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gdk_region_subtractgdk_region_subtract (l_result_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_gdk_regiongdk_region, l_region_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_gdk_regiongdk_region) end

feature -- Duplication
f_copy_region../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_copy_regioncopy_region (other: ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION) -- Update Current to be the same as other. local l_region_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xmlEV_REGION_IMP do ../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_disposedispose l_region_imp ?= other.../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation check l_region_imp /= Void then end ../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_gdk_regiongdk_region := {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gdk_region_copygdk_region_copy (l_region_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_gdk_regiongdk_region) end

f_gdk_region../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_gdk_regiongdk_region: FalsePOINTER -- Pointer to the GdkRegion object.
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_is_region_equal../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_is_region_equalis_region_equal (other: ../interface/ev_region.xmlEV_REGION): FalseBOOLEAN -- Does other have the same appearance as Current. local l_region_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xmlEV_REGION_IMP do if other /= Void then l_region_imp ?= other.../interface/ev_region.xml#f_implementationimplementation check l_region_imp /= Void then end Result := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gdk_region_equalgdk_region_equal (../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_gdk_regiongdk_region, l_region_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_gdk_regiongdk_region) end end
f_destroy../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_destroydestroy -- Destroy Current. do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_set_is_in_destroyset_is_in_destroy (True) ../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_disposedispose ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_set_is_destroyedset_is_destroyed (True) end
f_dispose../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_disposedispose -- Clean up Current. do if ../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_gdk_regiongdk_region /= Falsedefault_pointer then {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gdk_region_destroygdk_region_destroy (../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_gdk_regiongdk_region) ../implementation_gtk/ev_region_imp.xml#f_gdk_regiongdk_region := Falsedefault_pointer end end
